titleStmt.title: A discourse, of the true and visible markes of the Catholique Churche vvritten by M. Theod. Beza. Vezelius
De veris et visibilibus Ecclesiae Catholicae notis. English
titleStmt.author: Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605.
T. W. (Thomas Wilcox), 1549?-1608.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, dwelling without Temple-bar, in the Strond, neere vnto Sommerset-house,

notesStmt.note: Translator's dedication signed: T.W., i.e. Thomas Wilcox.
Translation of: De veris et visibilibus Ecclesiae Catholicae notis.
At least gathering A outer forme is in two settings: page A1r, line 5 ends: (1) "beeyng" or (2) "beeing".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Temple-bar, in the Strond, neere vnto Sommerset-house
